name: RM - FX - Datamosh
prompt: datamoshed digital art of {prompt} . video compression artifacts, pixel bleeding, melting pixels, glitch art, broken video file aesthetic, surreal distortion
negative_prompt: clean, sharp, high res, perfect, analog, painting

name: RM - FX - Thermal Vision
prompt: thermal camera imaging of {prompt} . predator vision, heat map colors (blue to red to yellow), high contrast, scientific visualization, glowing heat signatures
negative_prompt: natural colors, lighting, texture, shadows, realistic

name: RM - FX - ASCII Art
prompt: complex ASCII art of {prompt} . image created entirely from text characters, green on black terminal, retro hacker aesthetic, monospaced font texture
negative_prompt: pixels, smooth, solid lines, painting, photo, color

name: RM - FX - Double Exposure
prompt: artistic double exposure photography of {prompt} . silhouette of subject filled with nature landscape, dreamy overlay, multiple exposure, True Detective intro aesthetic
negative_prompt: single image, simple, standard photo, solid, opaque

name: RM - FX - Glitch Art (Pixel Sort)
prompt: pixel sorting glitch art of {prompt} . dragging vertical lines of pixels, data corruption, digital decay, aesthetic error, melting colors
negative_prompt: clean, perfect, painting, analog, smooth, unbroken

name: RM - FX - VHS Tracking
prompt: bad VHS tracking error on {prompt} . horizontal static lines, color bleeding, warping at bottom of frame, magnetic tape noise, retro 80s home video aesthetic

name: RM - FX - CRT Monitor
prompt: macro photography of CRT monitor showing {prompt} . visible RGB phosphor dots, scanlines, slight curvature, glowing pixels, retro technology aesthetic
negative_prompt: lcd, led, flat screen, sharp, paper, print, matte
